section.title: HTML DOM
section.para: A HTML webpage is represented via a HTML Document Object Model (DOM). The HTML DOM is defined via a W3C standard This HTML DOM defines a standard way to access and manipulate HTML documents. You can use JavaScript to modify the HTML DOM.

section.title: Manipulation HTML with JavaScript
section.para: You can for example search via JavaScript for certain elements and modify their properties. The following example shows how to find HTML elements with a certain div class and set the display property to hide / show them.
